info_head: In order to support connected Shabbat and Chag:
info_first_day: When The alarm is on and the button is active, the alarm will fire in one day
info_second_day: When The alarm is on and the button is active, the alarm will fire in two days
info_third_day: When The alarm is on and the button is active, the alarm will fire in three days
info_all_days: It is possible to activate more than one button in one notification, so that the same notification will sound at the same time on different days (depending on the selected buttons)
info_remove_alarm: In order to remove alarm, long press this button which located at the top left corner of every alarm
info_ringtone_update: You must approve notifications for this app and select a ringtone at the ringtones tab before setting the alarm, otherwise the ringtone will be the default or the previously set one
contact: To report bugs or comments, long press the email address:
